description: Reverse Image Product Search Engine Browser Extension
author: Romain Lebesle <job@thoughtsunificator.me> (https://thoughtsunificator.me)

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config rollup.config.prod.mjs && web-ext build --sourceDir dist/prod/public/ --filename ripse-extension.zip --artifactsDir build --overwrite-dest
scripts.start:ext: concurrently "rollup --config rollup.config.dev.ext.mjs --watch" "wait-on dist/dev-ext/public/manifest.json && web-ext run --sourceDir dist/dev-ext/public/ --args=--new-tab=https://www.mercadolivre.com.br/
scripts.start:ext:chromium: concurrently "rollup --config rollup.config.dev.ext.mjs --watch" "wait-on dist/dev-ext/public/manifest.json && web-ext run --target chromium --sourceDir dist/dev-ext/public/ --arg "https://www.mercadolivre.com.br/"
scripts.preversion: node -e "const m = require('./public/manifest.json'); m.version = process.env.npm_new_version; const fs = require('fs'); fs.accessSync('./public/manifest.json'); fs.writeFileSync('./public/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(m, null, '	'), 'utf8')" && git add public/manifest.json
